string.name: error_start_session_failed
string.translation_description: Error message from Cast MediaRouteProvider that indicates that the provider was not able to connect to the selected Cast device. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Chromecastデバイスとのセッションを開始できません。

string.name: error_session_ended
string.translation_description: Error message from Cast MediaRouteProvider that indicates that the provider has lost its connection to the selected Cast device. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Chromecastデバイスとの接続が切断されました。

string.name: error_ramp_command_failed
string.translation_description: Error message from Cast MediaRouteProvider that indicates that the provider got an error when sending a media command (e.g., load media, pause, etc.) to the selected Cast device. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: メディアの制御に失敗しました。

string.name: error_no_session
string.translation_description: Error message from Cast MediaRouteProvider that indicates that the user's device is not connected to a Cast device.

resources.string: 現在、Chromecastデバイスに接続されていません。
